pr_title: KeyRemapping: Add space as an option to remap.

timeline.bodyText:
Your indents here are one level too far.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			position = 20,
          
          
            
            			keyName = "space",
          
          
            
            			name = "Space",
          
          
            
            			description = "The key which will replace {Space}."
          
          
            
            		position = 20,
          
          
            
            		keyName = "space",
          
          
            
            		name = "Space",
          
          
            
            		description = "The key which will replace {Space}."
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Why is this tied to fkeys?
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: Ah, yea I did that because the escape key was also tied into the fkeys, and because all the F-keys and escape key is underneath the "Remap F Keys" checkbox.
replies.author: Tinusf

replies.bodyText: But it is indeed a little bit confusing, maybe there should be an additional checkbox created for escape and space?
replies.author: Tinusf

replies.bodyText: The escape key is part of the fkeys as far as the game is concerned (you can f-key map a tab to escape)
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: You could add this to the code down in keyRelease too
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: It might be good to write a test for this, since it would show you this is incorrect as it only remaps when fkeys is on.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.message:
keyremapping: add option to remap space in dialog

Co-authored-by: Tinus Flagstad <tinus@flagstad.as>
